/opt/odroid-x2/compiler/bin/arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++   -std=c++11  --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk    -Wl,--allow-shlib-undefined --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk CMakeFiles/serial_example.dir/examples/serial_otto.cc.o  -o /home/mi/boroujeni/model_car/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/.private/serial/lib/serial/serial_example  -L/opt/odroid-x2/sdk/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/mesa-egl  -L/opt/odroid-x2/sdk/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/mesa -rdynamic /home/mi/boroujeni/model_car/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/.private/serial/lib/libserial.so -lrt -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/opt/odroid-x2/sdk/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/mesa-egl:/opt/odroid-x2/sdk/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/mesa:/home/mi/boroujeni/model_car/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/.private/serial/lib
